channel.title: NPC saying something
channel.description:
How would i make my santa say "Ho! Ho! Ho!" (without the quotes) NOT WHEN U TALK TO HIM JUST LIKE OUTLOUD..
the x = 2656 y = 3305
ty, to who helps.

item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

your welcome glad i could help now if you need any further help just pm me

item.title: NPC saying something
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Ho ho ho"; } }

thats what i have for the full code

^

Press any key to continue . . .

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {//change the number to santas id if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Ho Ho Ho Ho"; }
under moo and the brackets.[/quote]

item.title: NPC saying something
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

go to npchandler press ctrl+f type moo and add under the last } add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) {//change the number to santas id
						if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Ho Ho Ho Ho";
						}

there you are so it looks like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}
f (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) {//change the number to santas id
						if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Ho Ho Ho Ho";
						}

hope i helped
